column4: Hi there, I'm not sure which website I was on , but I saw a website where you could pay for someone to write the code/a feature for you in an open source program like firefox etc   ....  Does anyone know what this website was .. I thnk it was french but I can't remember...
... err it is 'cos it involves open source programs used by ubuntu !
no it's not, asking "how can I pay someone to write an open source application" is not an ubuntu support question
